name: LIBERO Mail Minimal ZERO CARB (by Atino Core)
description:
Easy and private use of LIBERO Mail. Area extended, NO ads, NO ACCOUNT button, nothing but your mails. Other Styles: [see all]
■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal ■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal Zero ■ - Yahoo! Mail Zero Carbonella ■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal One ■ - Rai TV Streaming ■ - LIBERO Mail ZERO ■ - Speed Test OOKLA cleaner ■ - LA7 Essenziale Forte
additional_info: Video: LIBERO Mail Minimal ZERO / ZERO CARB February 2016. Tested on FireFox and Chrome (with or without AdBlock) works fine. This version displays mail-area extended. no advertising box, no site-bar, no search-box, no options and NO account menu, no logo, no footer, no navigation tabs, no logout button. suitable for your own tablets and netbooks, for an easy and private use of LIBERO Mail. PLEASE Report any problems or suggestions here. thanks. ...see also: MY OTHER STYLES
